pages.title: Kamen Rider Idunn
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Gaim Gaiden: Kamen Rider Zangetsu (2015, V-Cinema film)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gaim/devices/sengoku_driver#sengoku_driver_idunn)Sengoku Driver (Idunn)$(/l)$(br2)This form can be used by any Sengoku Driver user$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed III$(li)Regeneration II$(li)Haste II$(li)Saturation$(li)Strength IV
